lines.text: Hello, gorgeous! Care for a screw?
He used to say "fuck."
Any particular reason for the change?
Yeah, I get more fucks when I say "screw."

[to Mack]
Your wife, mate... your wife is one of the great bourgeois monsters of our time!

[to Don]
You're the one who throws these bloody parties.
No, no, actually, actually to be more accurate it was more of a dribble, because I'd been tasting wine and eating cheese for days, the old thing didn't have anything solid to come to grips with.

[to Don]
Let's face it, if you had to choose between me and that flat stomach million breasted tart out there. Who would it be?
I wouldn't like to be in your shoes if you hit me. I'll sue you for assault. I'm a lawyer.
I'm gonna smash your bloody teeth in.
He's a dentist.
Everybody, this is Evan and Kerry, that's Mack, Mal, Jody, Simon and Cooley.
Why don't you go live in Russia.
You don't know what you're fucking talking about!
What is Cooley like in bed?
Well he's not all that big, but he's energetic for his age. And inventive.
Don't take this as an insult fella. But you are a weak terd.
[first lines]
Could you put Richard in the car?
Right.
It's just an excuse for a booze up.
You might not be, but most of the people coming tonight will be very concerned about what's on that. Very concerned indeed.
Alright everyone, out of the kitchen, I'm about to unwrap my pornographic object. Ta-da!
You better all laugh, he spent all afternoon on it.
You have what's called a sought-after quality.
So?
It was your fault?
Yes, I'm a bit off.
I want a bit of sausage. What's he got that I haven't got?
Sex appeal.
Do you believe in honesty?
Yes.
Do you mind if I'm honest?
No.
I want to screw Don.

[to Simon]
Now shut up, I'm having an argument with your wife. Alright!
This party shits me.
You want to go home?
Woo hoo. Talk about coitus interruptus.
You know what's wrong with our marriage.
What?
The size of your thing.
[last lines]

[to Don]
Go to bed,
[repeated line]
Shit!
